## Step 1: Claim Your Sovereign Identity
ZeroTrace utilizes a **Passkey-First** authentication model. You must register at least one hardware anchor (YubiKey, TouchID, or Windows Hello) to access the Root Admin Dashboard.

[**> Register Admin Anchor <**](https://admin.zerotrace.ai/onboard/{{ORG_ID}}?token={{ONE_TIME_TOKEN}})

*Link expires in 24 hours.*

## Step 2: API Integration
Once authenticated, you can rotate your API keys and configure your OCI Registry allow-list from the **Adversarial Vault**.
